sentences: Ma olen täpsemalt vaadanud seda probleemi.
Täpsemalt öeldes on see väga raske ülesanne.
Ta seletas täpsemalt, mida me peame tegema.
context: The word täpsemalt is an adverb in Estonian that means more precisely or in more detail. It is commonly used to provide additional information or clarify something that has already been stated.
